title: Questiontype matrix options
description: Description of the options of the Questiontype 'matrix'

left.description: The Text that is shown left of the Matrix. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

right.description: The Text that is shown right of the Matrix. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

above.description: The Text that is shown above the Matrix. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

below.description: The Text that is shown below the Matrix. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

alignment.description: Choose one from ['horizontal', 'vertical', 'diagonal']. Sets the alignment of matrix. 'diagonal' is default if empty or missing. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties
